Welcome to Contacts project’s documentation!¶

REST API main¶

async main.healthchecker(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

The healthchecker function is a simple function that checks if the database is up and running. It does this by making a request to the database, and checking if it returns any results. If it doesn’t return any results, then we know something’s wrong with our connection.

Parameters:

db – AsyncSession: Pass the database session to the function

Returns:

A dict

Doc-author:

Trelent

main.index()¶
The index function responds to a request for /api/contacts with the complete list of contacts
return:

json string of list of contacts

Returns:

A dictionary with the key &quot;message&quot; and value &quot;contacts&quot;

Doc-author:

Trelent

async main.startup()¶

The startup function is called when the application starts up. It’s a good place to initialize things that are used by the app, such as connecting to databases or initializing caches.

Returns:

A coroutine, so we need to call it with await

Doc-author:

Trelent
